resources.string:
This application will block the Google Play Store from updating the Application that is currently in the foreground.

Google Play will show always show a notification, right before updating an app.
This application will therefor monitor the notifications.

This application needs additional permission to make this work.
(Normal applications are nog allowed to look at other applications notifications!!)

Therefor this appliction must be approved as Accessibility-Service.

Press the Button below and Enable the Anti-Autoupdate Accessability Service.
